February 11, 1958
Or. Irving R. Merrill
Director of Television Research
Michigan State University
East Lansing, Michigan
Dear Xrv:
Thank you for your letter of the 3rd. I, too,
believe that this can be an Important year for the
Research Committee. Just hope that we can get things
started so that the organisation will be headed in the
right direction, research-wise.
Concerning your questions and comments about
the radio Inventory project — this came along at a
good moment. If this cooperative project has not gone
through, I believe it would have been one of the first
major projects for the research committee — which we
would have had to finance alone. One of the problems
with the NAEB committee structure — members scattered
across the country — is that it is impossible to poll
the committee when decisions must be made quickly. I
assume that this is what happened with this one. As for
the source of the funds, this I do not know.
Thank you again for the letter. Looking forward
to some good suggestions from you for our research plans.
Sincerely,
Sam L. Becker
Director, Division of
Television-Radio-Film
